# angle

**Instance Property**

The angle of the motion, in radians, that determines which direction the blur smears.

## Declaration

```swift
var angle: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **radius**: The radius of the blur, in pixels.
